definition: to make into/to change into/-ization/to ... -ize/to transform/abbr. for 化學|化学[hua4 xue2]

sentences.english: He was enthused by biochemistry at HKUST and worked hard as he enjoyed his studies.
sentences.chinese: 科大生物化學系令他全情投入，好學不倦。

sentences.english: B:  I'm an assistant professor of chemistry.
sentences.chinese: 我是化學系的助理教授。

sentences.english: General, Organic and Biochemistry, James K. Hardy and the University of Akron .
sentences.chinese: 歡迎普通化學虛擬教室，靜宜大學應用化學系。

sentences.english: Graduated from the Department of Chemistry, National Fudan University in 1947.
sentences.chinese: 1947年畢業於國立復旦大學化學系。

sentences.english: In the early year, he graduated from the Chemistry Department of Qinghua University.
sentences.chinese: 早年畢業於清華大學化學系。

sentences.english: This is the website for Department of Biochemistry at Purdue University.
sentences.chinese: 這是普度大學生物化學系的網站。

sentences.english: The chemistry students had less time for play than the arts people in any case .
sentences.chinese: 化學系學生玩樂的時間無論如何比文科學生要少。

sentences.english: Physical chemistry experiment is one of the basic courses in Normal College.
sentences.chinese: 物理化學實驗是師範院校化學系的基礎課程。
